Keywords: Arakko , Horsemen , Past , Ruler , Warrior , X-Men
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
QUIET COUNCIL PRIVILEGE: Leadership, Invincible.
IMMORTALITY: At the beginning of the game and when Apocalypse KO's an opposing character, give him a Resurrection token (maximum 3). // When Apocalypse would take damage, you may remove a Resurrection token to take 1 unavoidable damage instead.
THE SCIENCE OF MAGIC: Probability Control, Shape Change.
